attributes.action: Encourage more companies to sign up to the Arkwright Scholarship scheme.
attributes.additional_details: The Arkwright Scholarship scheme is an Engineering  and Design/Technolgy scholarship  scheme. It is already supported by some highly succesful companises such as Rolls-Royce, BAE Systems and BT. They recognise they need engineers in their the field. If the government could get more companies to sponser scholars, it would aid the encouragement of engineering as well as not costing the tax payer.
